name: In re BUCKS COUNTY INVESTIGATING GRAND JURY. Appeal of Voicenet Communications, Inc., Omni Telecom, Inc. Brian Adelson

ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of August, 2004, the above captioned appeal is quashed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
